title: Pair of Shoes
description: white lined; red shoe body; embroidered overall in scroll design in black and purple, outlined in white, and silver metallic threead on front and sides; heel has black applique scroll design outlined in silver metallic thread; opening edges bound in woven red and black tape; upturned toes; reinforced soles with heavy cord stitching throughout
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
